title: Nyjah Huston talks skateboarding, Tony Hawk game, and the Olympics
description: USA's Nyjah Huston is one of the greatest skateboarders of his generation. His goal to become the very first male street skateboarding Olympic champion. We spoke to Nyjah about his perfect skate crew, his Olympic dream, and dealing with pressure. Plus, how it feels to play as himself in the Tony Hawk video game.
itunes:title: Nyjah Huston talks skateboarding, Tony Hawk game, and the Olympics
